descriptionHtml: Welcome to badtown! Where no person isn't accepted. It's the only free hamlet in the entirity of skyrim. No guards, no laws! Anyone is welcome here! We got serial killers, cannibals, wizards, theives, nazis, bandits and storekeeps alike! There is no better place to get a drink than at the local speakeasy, or perhaps you wish to sell off some loot; we have an excellent general store. Looking to kill something deader? GO to our lovely blacksmith who happens to be homeless. If you just need to rest, Go and look for a friend at the commonhouse.-adds a town the size of riverwood in between whiterun and rorikstead.-
author: adrian85858
